1.0.0.en: Support for 10 inputs, some awesome cards to deal with rapidly changing inputs and much more!

1.1.0.en: MAJOR UPDATE: Each formula now has its own isolated input state! New 'First Impression' mode locks inputs at first value. Added timeout detection and manual re-evaluation. ⚠️ Breaking changes - recommended to create new devices.

1.2.0.en: Logic device with visual pairing, dynamic number of inputs, JSON auto-formatting, lots of improvements, rewritten, more efficient code++

1.2.1.en: Bug fixes. Mostly regex optimization, but also re-evaluation after changing formulas.

1.2.2.en: Added a couple of cards for evaluation and error control.
